Definitely one of the best games I have ever played. The music is good, the puzzles make you think, and I love all the callbacks and the things it tells you so you can remember them later. No matter how experienced you are with video games, please play this. I can not recommend it enough.
我不知道是兼容性问题还是bug，我手柄插着，用键鼠操作，教程关给我卡哪里了，百度说要禁用手柄，所以我用了一下手柄，UI切换出现了bug，接着无法进行，重启游戏，禁用手柄，进入教程关，不再出现有关键盘移动的文字提示，退出游戏，卸载。

I was absolutely astonished to see a brand new Portal game come out in 2020 and let me tell you this is a great send off to the series! I love the mechanics combined from Counter Strike Source where you use the guns to kill [spoiler]Captain Price[/spoiler] It was bad though at the end when i had to replay the whole game 1/34 would Recommend if you actually like the first one

It is a fun game. A lot of content is in this game. Single Player, Co-Op, User Generated Maps for both modes, and mods.

Another stellar job by Valve Softworks in Valve, Maryland. I really appreciated the battle royale aspects and how crisp the defuse gameplay was. I just wish there weren't targeted adds before every lootbox. Other than that, I would definitely recommend this game.

This game is really great, tons of story, hard puzzles, and funny lines. It is very long as I have played over 20 hours and have still not beaten the game. Would recommend playing the first one first though.
Really great game, unique play style, fun puzzles
Muy buena secuela. Me gusto que mostraran algo de contexto y su historia, ya que en el PORTAL 1 casi no lo note.
had to noclip through a few stages because i'm dumb but overall 8/10
i like this game because you have to think but there is action and supense this is a super fun game to play

This game is a masterpiece. I have never laughed so much while playing a game, and it's quality humour(just like your generous... ness). But there is something that I really hated, the (around) 2h factory run after the amazing first 3h and last, amazing again, 1h. The first game had the same factory bs but it lasted 30mins and it was straight to the point. Here it is like 2h and NO ONE SPEAKS, nothing, nada, no dialog, no humour, no nice enviroments, the same bad enviroments over and over again with the same mechanincs for 2h straight with no humour/dialog to make it worth it. And the solution is simple too, too late now, but just make that part like 30mins, after you fall in the pit till you go to the test chambers again, the game becomes a slow boring chore, everything besides that is masterpiece level.
yes it is good for years
игра стоит своих денег можно поломать себе мозги и повесилиться с друзьями
I prefer puzzle games over FPS games or combat-based games. Portal 2 is a very good puzzle game and is still enjoyable even if you can't solve the puzzles or are just walking around.

If i had to rate this game in one word it would be "masterpiece" 
the game has a perfect balance of the story and the puzzles, which have different pieces every time, which causes the game to never get boring, at all. I enjoyed the humour included in the dialogues.
The gameplay requires a high amount of cognitive skills at times, however the puzzles are not too hard, just perfect.
Definitely recommended, 9.5/10
